text.description: Situated in arguably the most sought after road in Fleet, this character 5 bedroom house which also benefits from a 1 bedroom annexe, has the main family accommodation over three floors to include 3 spacious reception rooms, well fitted kitchen/breakfast room, 2 family bathrooms and 5 bedrooms. The annexe comprises bedroom, modern kitchen, bathroom and living room with gas central heating. The whole property benefits from double glazing and central heating with radiators. Quietly situated in a tree lined avenue, the property sits on a one acre plot offering an extremely high level of privacy provided by mature trees and hedging and is within walking distance of Fleet town centre with its extensive range of shopping and leisure facilities, local schools and is approximately 1.75 miles from Fleet mainline station (London Waterloo from 43 minutes).

Heated Pool
Double Glazing
Off road parking
double Garage
text.notes: fixtures and fittings to be included in sale

feature.heading: Kitchen
feature.description: Kitchen description Kitchen description Kitchen description Kitchen description Kitchen description Kitchen description 5' 10" x 5' 10" (1.78m x 1.78m)

feature.heading: Lounge
feature.description: 7.00m x 7.00m (23' x 23' ) Feature bay window with attractive views of garden, open fireplace with coal effect gas fire.

feature.heading: Dining Room
feature.description: 8.00m x 3.00m (26' 3" x 9' 10") Rear aspect window with views over garden, open fireplace (not functional), glazed door leading to rear vestibule.

feature.heading: Bedroom 1
feature.description: 7.00m x 6.00m (23' x 19' 8") Attractive double aspect room with views over garden.

feature.heading: Bedroom 2
feature.description: 8.00m x 6.00m (26' 3" x 19' 8") Rear aspect with views over garden, built in wardrobe cupboard, feature fireplace (not used by current owners), vanity unit with wash hand basin.

feature.heading: Bedroom 3
feature.description: 4' 10" x 6' (1.47m x 1.83m) Bedroom description Bedroom description Bedroom description Bedroom description Bedroom description Bedroom description Bedroom description

feature.heading: Attic Room
feature.description: 8.00m x 6.00m (26' 3" x 19' 8") Shelved airing cupboard with lagged copper cylinder. Bedroom: Attractive double bedroom with views over front garden, built in wardrobes with matching bedside units. Kitchen: Well fitted kitchen with eye and base level units, sink and drainer unit, built in BOSCH hob with electric oven under and extractor fan over, integrated washer/dryer, fridge, freezer, door to living room. Living Room: Attractive views over rear garden through window and door, gas fire. Bathroom: Frosted window, modern suite comprising panel enclosed bath with mixer tap, separate wall mounted shower and shower screen, vanity unit with wash hand basin, low level wc, fully tiled walls and flooring, heated towel rail.

feature.heading: Front Garden
feature.description: The property is privately situated on a one acre plot with the front garden enjoying a high level of screening provided by rhododendron hedging, large in and out driveway with parking for numerous vehicles leading to a detached double garage. The southerly aspect private rear garden has a full width patio immediately to the rear of the property with steps leading down to a large lawn, further area of garden is laid to light woodland with numerous Rhododendron and Laurel hedging. The property is well screened by mature trees and hedging.

feature.heading: Garage
feature.description: Electric roller door, electric power and light.

feature.heading: Swimming Pool
feature.description: Swimming Pool Swimming Pool Swimming Pool Swimming Pool Swimming Pool Swimming Pool Swimming Pool Swimming Pool Swimming Pool
